discord.token: DO NOT SET - USE ENV VAR: DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN
discord.gov_channel_id: DO NOT SET - USE ENV VAR: DISCORD_GOV_CHANNEL_ID

twitter.consumer_key: DO NOT SET - USE ENV VAR: TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY
twitter.consumer_secret: DO NOT SET - USE ENV VAR: TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET
twitter.access_token: DO NOT SET - USE ENV VAR: TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN
twitter.access_token_secret: DO NOT SET - USE ENV VAR: TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET

app.snapshot_webhook_token: DO NOT SET - USE ENV VAR: SNAPSHOT_WEBHOOK_TOKEN
app.discourse_webhook_token: DO NOT SET - USE ENV VAR: DISCOURSE_WEBHOOK_TOKEN
app.discourse_instance_name: DO NOT SET - USE ENV VAR: DISCOURSE_INSTANCE_NAME
app.has_ethgovalerts: DO NOT SET - USE ENV VAR: HAS_ETHGOVALERTS

twitter_ethgovalerts.consumer_key: DO NOT SET - USE ENV VAR: TWITTER_ETHGOV_CONSUMER_KEY
twitter_ethgovalerts.consumer_secret: DO NOT SET - USE ENV VAR: TWITTER_ETHGOV_CONSUMER_SECRET
twitter_ethgovalerts.access_token: DO NOT SET - USE ENV VAR: TWITTER_ETHGOV_ACCESS_TOKEN
twitter_ethgovalerts.access_token_secret: DO NOT SET - USE ENV VAR: TWITTER_ETHGOV_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET
